snippet.title: Robot Wants It All Trailer
snippet.description:
Robot Wants It All is a compilation of the Robot Wants games from 2010 - Robot Wants Kitty, Robot Wants Puppy, Robot Wants Fishy, and Robot Wants Ice Cream. It also includes Robot Wants Y, which was the banner on the website Jayisgames.com for a while back then, but not available anywhere else until now. And lastly, it includes Robot Wants Justice, a brand new adventure for Robot.  Check it out! 

It's pixel art, metroidvania, platformer, speedruns. All that stuff. With lots of secret bonuses and high score tables.

Available now for Windows and Linux, on Steam and Itch.io!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/834760/Robot_Wants_It_All
Itch.io: https://hamumu.itch.io/robot-wants-it-all
